about.details:
Incorporated in 1997, Siddharth Education Services Limited provides tutorial coaching services for students of professional courses in India. It offers tutorial services for company secretary, chartered accountancy, and cost and management accountancy, as well as CFA courses.

Currently they have 4 (four) Company operated centres and a team of 22 faculty members. The company offers test series courses which have been systematically designed to provide effective and efficient education to students in simple and lucid manner. A partnership arm of the group is engaged in farming segment which has negligible contribution in revenues but investment made is much higher than education segment.

contactDetails.full_address: Siddharth Education Services Ltd, 101 1st Floor Chirag Arcade, Behind Nagrik Stores E R Road, Thane (West) - 400601

faqs.question: What is the Siddharth Education IPO?
faqs.answer:
Siddharth Education IPO is a SME IPO of 3108000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.88 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹35 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on September 29, 2017, and closes on October 5, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Siddharth Education IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Siddharth Education IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Siddharth Education IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Siddharth Education IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Siddharth Education IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Siddharth Education IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Siddharth Education IPO opens on September 29, 2017 and closes on October 5, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Siddharth Education IPO?
faqs.answer: Siddharth Education IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Siddharth Education IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Siddharth Education IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
